name: OPTICAL SOCIETY OF AMERICA
sampleDescriptions: Issue related to infrastructure funding and development including quantum technologies
Urging creation of a National Quantum Initiative.
Funding for FY 2018 for NSF and NIST in Commerce, Justice, Science Funding bill HR 5393 and S. 2837.
Urging creation of a National Quantum Initiative in the House (H.R. 6227) and Senate (S. 3143).
Urging increased support for the Inertial Confinement Fusion Program and the Laboratory for Laser Energetics in the National Defense Authorization Act for FY 2019 (S.2987).
